tool_description: Determines zodiac sign placements for celestial bodies and provides basic sign interpretations and elemental analysis.

planet_longitudes.description: Array of planetary longitudes in degrees.

planet_names.description: Names corresponding to the longitude positions.

error_messages: Invalid longitude values: All values must be between 0 and 360 degrees.
Array length mismatch: planet_longitudes and planet_names must have identical length.
Invalid planet names: Use standard astrological body names (Sun, Moon, Mercury, etc.).
Empty arrays: Both input arrays must contain at least 8 elements.
usage: Input planetary longitudes with corresponding planet names to determine zodiac sign placements and receive elemental/modal analysis.

sign_placements.description: Array of planet-in-sign placements (e.g., 'Sun in Leo')

element_count.description: Count of planets in Fire, Earth, Air, Water signs

modality_count.description: Count of planets in Cardinal, Fixed, Mutable signs

dominant_element.description: Most prominent element based on planetary placements
